system.description:
You have become a lethal magical shadow in the night, able to strike with deadly precision and then fade away. How you use this talent is, of course, up to you. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity or witch spellcasting ability score increases by 1 to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your witch levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.p5l9usj384rd1qaf]{Low Profile} feature.
  • Half your rogue levels count as witch levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.vgx9qhqph9937nov]{Bewitching Personality} feature.
  • While you are under the effects of a spell of the obscurement school that you have cast, half your witch levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of determining the damage dealt by your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.4727pnvz5nwn3h23]{Sneak Attack} feature.
